description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Raid is a 1 to 4 player arcade-style side-scroller with an emphasis on staying alive.  With six difficulty levels, two game types, and two multiplayer modes, Raid is meant to be played however you want.  Featuring entirely custom content, including sound effects, graphics, and a soundtrack, Raid is designed to feel like a handcrafted game.  Great for all ages and skill levels.
